name: Temple of Elemental Evil, The

task.description: Installing. This may take a while...
task.name: wineexec

files.setup: N/A: Please select the setup.exe downloaded from GOG.com

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/drive_c/GOG Games/Temple of Elemental Evil/ToEE.exe

content:
files:
- setup: 'N/A: Please select the setup.exe downloaded from GOG.com'
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/drive_c/GOG Games/Temple of Elemental Evil/ToEE.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /SILENT /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI
    description: Installing. This may take a while...
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
wine:
  esync: true
